verses.roman:
āpane mahāprabhu gāya yāṅra nṛtya-kāle
prabhura caraṇa dhari' vakreśvara bale

synonyms: āpane—personally; mahāprabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; gāya—sang; yāṅra—whose; nṛtya-kāle—at the time of dancing; prabhura—of the Lord; caraṇa—lotus feet; dhari'-embracing; vakreśvara—Vakreśvara Paṇḍita; bale—said.
translation: Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu personally sang while Vakreśvara Paṇḍita danced, and thus Vakreśvara Paṇḍita fell at the lotus feet of the Lord and spoke as follows.
